summary:
No Esp Mod.
This Mod makes dragonborn be enhanced by everytime he/she absorb a soul from the dragon.
descriptionHtml:
[i]Dragonborn and dragons are the pieces of Akatosh. When dragonborn absorb souls from other dragons, he/she is collecting the pieces of Akatosh. Then the piece become bigger and bigger.[/i]

But in the game absorb the dragon soul just make you learn the knowlege of shout. You can't get more thing from dragon souls.

So the Mod is made.
It makes you become more strongger each time you absorb a dragon soul.
In detail, [b][color=#9900ff]when you absorb a dragon soul from dragon, your attribute will be enhanced as follows:[/color]
[color=#6aa84f](there are four version which you can choose during installation)[/color]
[color=#6aa84f]health +(0, 1, 3, 5)[/color]
[color=#6aa84f]magicka +[/color][b][color=#6aa84f](0, 1, 3, 5)[/color][/b]
[color=#6aa84f]stamina +[/color][b][color=#6aa84f][b][color=#6aa84f](0, 1, 3, 5)[/color][/b][/color][/b]
[color=#6aa84f]carryweight +[/color][b][color=#6aa84f][b][color=#6aa84f](0, 1, 3, 5)[/color][/b][/color][/b]
[color=#6aa84f]armor +[/color][b][color=#6aa84f]([b][color=#6aa84f]0, 1, 3, 5[/color][/b])[/color][/b]
[color=#6aa84f]resistance of all non-phycial damage +[/color][b][color=#6aa84f]([b][color=#6aa84f]0, 0.1%, 0.5%, 1%[/color][/b])[/color][/b]
[color=#6aa84f]movement speed +(0, 0.01, 0.1, 0.25) (It is not percentage, base speed is 100)[/color]
[color=#6aa84f]shout cd [/color][b][color=#6aa84f]([/color][b][color=#6aa84f]0, -0.1%, -0.5%, -1%[/color][/b][color=#6aa84f])[/color]
[color=#00ffff]Each kind of addtion has four choices. You can combine those choices to fit your own taste.[/color][/b][/b]

[color=#ff7700]All the enhancements are permanent! You will not lose the enhancements when you cost dragon soul.[/color]

It also works when you absorb soul from Miraak(Absorb Miraak's soul will gain you many dragon souls, so the enhancement is also multiple)

[b][color=#00ff00]The Mod contains no esp[/color][/b], so you can freely install or uninstall it, and it does no harm to your save

[color=#ff0000]DragonBorn DLC is requied.[/color]

It compatible with almost all Mod. Both SLE and SSE are workable.
author: AdventurerX
